detail_desc: Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed, superstretch denim with worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.

Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, and 3/4-length sleeves. Detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Reverse-stitched cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, buttons down the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a boat neck and gathers at the sides for best fit.
Straight, wide T-shirt in a cotton weave with a visible zip at the neck.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jumper in a chunky cotton knit with pattern-knit details, gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a grosgrain loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorter jumper in a rib knit with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top and long sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and button placket.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Tunic in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and straight, ankle-length legs.
Short jacket in washed cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Two-strand metal chain necklace. One of the chains has a bar-shaped pendant and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot at the top.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps that join at the back, and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in velvet made from a silk blend with a deep V-neck and an opening at the back with a concealed press-stud at the back of the neck. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, discreet side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Short, sleeveless dress in textured jersey with a sheen. Stand-up collar, decorative pleats and an opening at the top. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Checked shirt in soft cotton twill with a turn-down collar, chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Top in organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves.
Knee-length skirt in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and a short slit in one side.
Leggings in glossy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and elasticated foot straps.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and classic front. Matching tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a round, frill-trimmed neckline and small opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleats at the top for added volume, a seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication, and a double-layered skirt with an asymmetric top layer. Lined.
Coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, long sleeves with a tab and button, and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Super push-up bra in hole-patterned jersey with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless shirt dress in a cotton dobby weave with a collar, button placket, detachable belt at the waist and small chest pocket.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a racer back. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, asymmetric skirt. Jersey lining.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Wide, slightly boxy jumper in a soft knit with a shimmering metallic coating. Dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Large metal hoop earrings decorated with metal chains. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Short, sleeveless nightdress in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Wide shorts in a viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and side pockets.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft, ribbed cotton blend with short sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.

Block-coloured sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Pyjamas in soft jersey and lace. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups with removable inserts and a lace trim under the bust. Shorts with an elasticated waist and lace trim at the hems.
Alice band with large, bendable rabbit ears on top.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, seam under the bust and sewn-in ties at the back of the waist. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim, and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired microfibre bra with lace details and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce that can be worn in different ways.
Joggers in lightweight, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and ribbed hems.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length balloon sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Skater skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut utility jacket in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, and large front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable tab and buttons at the back and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt.
Dress in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a round neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes and narrow straps that cross over the foot and go around the ankle. Adjustable fastening with a small metal buckle. Finely fluted soles.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.

Straight-cut jacket in soft faux shearling with a hood, zip down the front, handwarmer pockets and pockets in the side seams. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. Lining in a recycled polyester weave.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details in a looser fit. Jersey panel at the waist for optimum comfort, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a text print. Bottoms with an all-over print and elasticated waist.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and cotton blend.
Short-sleeved body in stretch viscose jersey with a flounce-trimmed V-neck at the front, V-neck at the back and press-studs at the crotch.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
